about.details:
Incorporated in 1996, Worth Peripherals Limited engaged in manufactures and sells of corrugated boxes. The company offers regular slotted containers, die cut corrugated boxes/trays, multi-color corrugated boxes and Z sleeve, I/honeycomb partitions. They are ISO 9001:2008 and FSC certified company which serves clients in FMCG sector.

Company’s both manufacturing units are located at Pithampur, Dhar, Indore (MP). It has fully automated plant that can have multi colour (up to 6 colours) printing. With growth in the retail, pharma, breweries, textile sectors, opportunity for growth in packaging industries has increased and thus Company aims to tap these markets for further marketing and supply. Indian packaging industry is currently valued at Rs. 85000 crore and is growing at an annual rate of 15 per cent plus. Sector is expected to be triple in next five years.

faqs.question: What is the Worth Peripherals IPO?
faqs.answer:
Worth Peripherals IPO is a SME IPO of 4251000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹18.28 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹43 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 15, 2017, and closes on September 19, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Worth Peripherals IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Worth Peripherals IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Worth Peripherals IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Worth Peripherals IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Worth Peripherals IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Worth Peripherals IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Worth Peripherals IPO opens on September 15, 2017 and closes on September 19, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Worth Peripherals IPO?
faqs.answer: Worth Peripherals IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,29,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Worth Peripherals IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Worth Peripherals IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
